attributes.review: This app is terrible... the worst there ever was... other apps... are superior... it can’t and will never be able to compete with the others... you know there are a lot of apps, hundreds and hundreds
attributes.title: The worst app on the App Store

attributes.review: My children downloaded this app and now they have gone missing! The last thing they said was the Cheeto man wanted to take them on a submarine trip to a special island. The FBI is not doing anything to help me get my children back!!! BEWARE!!!!!
attributes.title: Beware!!!

attributes.review: The design has some serious flaws and glitches when I try to use it. There are also a lot of instances where false information and harmful language is used.
attributes.title: Worst App I’ve Ever Used

attributes.review:
When I first opened the app it said, “If you are age 40+ you are going to be kidnapped at 9:00 AM Friday July 10, 2020” it also sent me threats through email around 30 minutes later. Some said they would prefer me as pot roast, while others said people in black suits will show up at 3 AM July 10, 2020 demanding every electronic in the house. This is unacceptable. I am over the age of 40 AND THIS OFFENDS ME! 

Well let’s see! Anyways Trumpet is...... what is he? Fill in the blank,

Ra_ist
P—C
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!

attributes.review: my name is karen johnson and i wanted to download this app, it took days to download and once it finally did it was so hard to get information about the trump 2020 campaign!! further more this app is poorly designed and super hard to navigate!! i used to have faith in our president but this is just crossing the line. this is completely unacceptable and just down right bad. i would like to speak to the manger please!! 😠😠
attributes.title: this is horrible!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what trumps plans were for 2020. But it’s hard to do that when the app is constantly crashing every time I open it. It is just not a well made app
attributes.title: Worst app on the apple store

attributes.review: I went to go see what Trump was doing not go into Willy Wonka’s factory. This sad disfigured Oompa Loompa was there, i think this app is actually a insightful app of what really happens in the factory, this is not a app of our “great” , hopefully soon to be late, President
attributes.title: I don’t even know what to say

attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing alright
Then I became a princess overnight
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right
So much to learn and see

Up in the castle with my new family
In a school that's just for royalty
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me
I'm so excited to be

(Sofia the First)
I'm finding out what being royal's all about
(Sofia the First)
Making my way it's an adventure everyday

(Sofia)
It's gonna be my time
(Sofia)
To show them all that I'm
Sofia the First!
attributes.title: TikTok lives matter ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.review: This app was horrible. It provided me with no information that I actually wanted and took several days to download. It was not up to what I expected I would not recommend this for any fellow trump supporters.👎🏼
attributes.title: Not worth it

attributes.review: literally i got this app and every time i go on it it shuts my whole phone down. what??? no other app has ever done this not even p0rn apps. and for what??? so i can see mr cheeto man prancing around trying to get his speech out in garbled language? no thanks. the layout of this app made me throw up. no exaggeration. i’m at my desk, eating my peas. and it all comes right back up. visual pain to see. jeez please don’t get this app out of the safety of your health.
attributes.title: waste of data
